item.description: This is a wonderful spot in any season. The road across the Dam is plowed. The trails on the state park side are packed. Yes there is water...Everett Lake...but I feel the pups will be fine as there is not a current by the beach or away from the immediate dam area. I will be bringing along a 30' leash in case of emergency and would recommend others do the same. This is a good idea for any hikes in the winter that are near water bodies. So come on down to Clough's for a fun get together.
item.how_to_find_us: Park in the Everett Dam parking area. Kay and I will be there in the white Yaris

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Clough Park-hiking/snowshoeing
